title: Strike Public Release
content:
✨ New Features

  • Advanced Moderation Tools: Kick, ban, timeout, and warn users with lightning speed. Includes detailed mod logs and user history.
  • AutoMod System: Block spam, links, excessive caps, and more with customizable filters.
  • Strike AI Chatbot: A chaotic, sarcastic, and slightly unhinged AI personality powered by advanced natural language response logic.
  • Leveling System: Reward active members with XP, levels, and custom roles.
  • Ticket System: Manage support tickets right inside your server with ease.
  • Custom Commands: Set up your own commands using keywords or dynamic inputs.
  • Anti-Raid & Anti-Nuke Protections: Keep your server safe with instant detection and lockdown features.
  • Server Statistics & Uptime: Live stats including bot status, latency, command usage, and more.
  • Slick Dashboard UI: Manage all your bot settings from a clean and animated web dashboard.

🛠️ Improvements

  • Full OAuth2 login integration for user-linked dashboard access.
  • Server-specific settings saved to dynamic collections for faster load times.
  • Smarter role handling and permission management.
  • Clean embeds and compact message formatting.

🐞 Bug Fixes

  • Fixed random response repetition in Strike AI.
  • Cleaned up broken role mentions in dynamic command replies.
  • Resolved occasional crashes from empty option-user inputs.

💡 What's Next?

  • Slash command support.
  • Custom embed builder.
  • Public command marketplace.
  • Server economy + inventory system.
  • Strike Personality Editor.

Thank you to everyone who tested the early builds and gave feedback. This is just the beginning. Stay loud. Stay chaotic. Stay Strike. 💥
